com.hazelcast.cache.impl

Class CacheContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.cache.impl.CacheContext

  • public class CacheContext
extends Object
    Holds some specific informations for per cache in the node and shared by all partitions of that cache on the node.
